PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-07012018-06-06,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisAppointment of SANDIP K. LALLI of Heritage Pointe, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Ghislain Harvey, whose term has expired.
